scripts.mock: npm config set vue-typescript:environment dev&&npm config set vue-typescript:mock 1&&vue-cli-service serve
scripts.dev-dev: npm config set vue-typescript:environment dev&&npm config set vue-typescript:mock 0&&vue-cli-service serve
scripts.dev-sit: npm config set vue-typescript:environment sit&&npm config set vue-typescript:mock 0&&vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build-dev: npm config set vue-typescript:environment dev&&npm config set vue-typescript:mock 0&&vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-sit: npm config set vue-typescript:environment sit&&npm config set vue-typescript:mock 0&&vue-cli-service build
